replies.author: hqqaazz
replies.txt_content:
前置
/scoreboard objectives add time dummy复制代码/scoreboard objectives add player dummy复制代码/scoreboard players set @p player 1复制代码/scoreboard players set @p time 600复制代码

高频激活以下所有指令：
/scoreboard players remove @p[score_time_min=1] time 1复制代码
注：如果是指令高频的话，加20就是1秒
重置系统：
/scoreboard players set @p[score_player_min=1,score_time=0] time 600复制代码

判定：
/execute @p[score_player_min=1,score_time=0] ~ ~ ~ effect @p 14 101复制代码

整个系统就是每过30秒给玩家10秒的隐身药水效果。
